meanings.sent1: The allomorphic patterns of the leaves fascinated the botanist.
meanings.sent2: The allomorphic features of the crystals made them unique.
meanings.sent3: The allomorphic colors of the chameleon made it the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: Her allomorphic personality shone brightly in the dull office environment.
meanings.sent5: The allomorphic shapes of the clouds painted a beautiful picture in the sky.

meanings.definition: Showing variation in form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The allomorphic rocks in the cave displayed different shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: The allomorphic buildings in the city added character to the skyline.
meanings.sent3: The allomorphic hairstyles of the group made them stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent4: His allomorphic ideas transformed the way we approached the project.
meanings.sent5: The allomorphic clouds in the sky created a stunning sunset.
